long_description: Commanding in presence and comfortable in practice, this timeless full-grain Luxe Whip boot from Merrell is ready to tackle any daily mission. Oiled full-grain leather uppers breath and have breathable mesh linings treated with natural enzymes that help prevent odors from developing. Interior zippers allow easy on and off. Plush foam footbeds remember the shape of your feet for excellent comfort every time you wear them. Polyurethane midsoles with Air Cushion heel pockets absorb shock and supply ample cushioning for comfort. Nylon arch shanks ensure dependable support and side-to-side stability. Merrell Luxe Whip boots feature grippy rubber outsoles for sure footing.
short_description: Commanding in presence and comfortable in practice, this timeless full-grain Luxe Whip boot from Merrell is ready to tackle any daily mission.
